name: VISIO
description: Visio eases and enhances vocabulary learning by utilizing Augmented Reality technology and OCR features.

name: BID.BA
description: Bid.ba is an auctioning platform for vintage items that provides space and visibility to the world of art and collectables.

name: FOODIE
description: Foodie is a nutrition-based app with a customized meal planning to avoid or mitigate illnesses and difficulties that can be caused by an improper diet, such as heart diseases, diabetes, high blood pressure, and many more.

name: PICK & FIX
description: Finding a professional for an in-house service is time-consuming and with a lack of comparison. Pick&Fix offers a solution by connecting offers and demands in one place with a clear track and review of all information.

name: EMPLOYEE MANAGEMENT
description: Simple management application to add, edit, and delete employees as well as search employees based on name, email, phone and job title in the database.

name: NERDY
description: Nerdy is a personal blog site for sharing tutorials and insights of computer science related subjects. Implemented basic CRUD functionality for posts so far.

name: FINANCE TRACKER
description: Finance Tracker social media app - using Devise for authentication, generators, search forms, Ajax, JavaScript, search functionality, external API usage, secure credentials management, rapid prototyping.
